sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { FileText, Link, Mail, BookOpen, Copy, CheckCheck, Users, Brain, Database, Dna, Sun, Moon } from 'lucide-react'; import { Alert, AlertDescription } from './components/ui/alert'; const PersonalPage = () => { const [copiedIndex, setCopiedIndex] = useState(null); const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false); // Check system preference on mount useEffect(() => { if (window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches) { setDarkMode(true); } }, []); // Toggle theme class on body useEffect(() => { document.documentElement.classList.toggle('dark', darkMode); }, [darkMode]); const publications = [ { title: "Publication Title 1", authors: "Author1, Author2, Your Name", journal: "Journal Name", year: "2024", doi: "10.1234/example", bibtex: `@article{paper2024, title={Publication Title 1}, author={Author1 and Author2 and Your Name}, journal={Journal Name}, year={2024}, doi={10.1234/example} }` }, { title: "Publication Title 2", authors: "Your Name, Author3", journal: "Conference Proceedings", year: "2023", doi: "10.1234/example2", bibtex: `@inproceedings{conf2023, title={Publication Title 2}, author={Your Name and Author3}, booktitle={Conference Proceedings}, year={2023}, doi={10.1234/example2} }` } ]; const copyBibtex = (bibtex, index) => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(bibtex); setCopiedIndex(index); setTimeout(() => setCopiedIndex(null), 2000); }; return (
{/* Theme Toggle Button */} {/* Header Section */}

Your Name

Professor of [Your Field]

[University Name]

{/* Academic Profile Links */}
ORCID Google Scholar ResearchGate
{/* Research Opportunities Alert */}

Looking for Research Collaborators!

I'm actively seeking passionate students and researchers interested in:

Machine Learning
Recommender Systems
Bioinformatics

If you're interested in pursuing research in these areas, please reach out via email to discuss potential collaboration opportunities, including PhD positions and research internships.

{/* Publications Section */}

Selected Publications

{publications.map((pub, index) => (

{pub.title}

{pub.authors}

{pub.journal} ({pub.year})

DOI: {pub.doi}
))}
{/* Teaching Section */}

Teaching

{[ { course: "Course Title 1", code: "ABC123", level: "Undergraduate", description: "Brief description of the course content and objectives" }, { course: "Course Title 2", code: "XYZ789", level: "Graduate", description: "Brief description of the course content and objectives" } ].map((course, index) => (

{course.course} ({course.code})

{course.level}

{course.description}

))}
{/* Contact Section */}

Contact

Email: your.email@university.edu

Department of [Your Department]

Office: Building Name, Room XXX

Â© 2025 Your Name. All rights reserved.

); }; export default PersonalPage;
